data.meta_description: Movies Similar to The Wizard of Gore: The Horror Show (1989), Blood Feast (1963), Two Thousand Maniacs! (1964), 100 Tears (2007), Seed (2006), Chromeskull: Laid to Rest 2 (2011), Color Me Blood Red (1965), Psycho Cop (1989), Blood Feast 2: All U Can Eat (2002), Severed (2002)
